"About \"Skill Points\"":
"Every time a player levels up, they receive a Skill Point (SP).

By adding SP to a Class Skill, you help make your character grow."

"Each Class Skill can be leveled up by placing a Skill Point into them.

Some skills cannot be leveled until another skill has been leveled.

Since you have limited SP, it's recommended you carefully plan out what skills to grab and level.

※Some skills may require no SP to level.
※Some skills have a level requirement that needs to be met in order to level them."

"Skills are broadly classified into the following types:

・Active Skills
These are skills that, once learned, can be put on your Subpalette.

・Passive Skills
These are skills that are automatically activated once learned.

※After learning a skill, be sure to check your Subpalette Menu to ensure that you did not forget any Active Skills you may have learned."

"Not only can you use Main Class skills, but your Subclass skills as well.
※Some Subclass skills may not work with your Main Class.

Try to use skills that synergize with your Main Class and Subclass."
